name: rawan
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText:
Hey rawan i decided to take advantage of this special love day and confess my feelings
I like you, i wanna have a future with you, but i don't wanna date rn cuz it's gonna end up bad most of time and obsession issues, i would prefer being friends texting from time to time, but i wanted to tell u this i don't wanna keep it a secret to myself
So rawan i wanna tell u why do i have a crush on u first of all ur personality u have a kind,funny and smart type of personality and that's so cute, second of all ur eyes and smile they are so cute and i love them  
 my fav  moment with u is when we have met in my grandpa's house the cute little interactions and eye contact we had there's alot to talk abt but i will leave it short 
Inshallah u will be my wife and we can have a beautiful marriage
Have a nice day princess
